alert.note: Alert for Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 9:55AM CDT until July 17 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN NODAWAY COUNTY... At 955 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maryville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Barnard, Conception Junction, Guilford, Arkoe, Quitman and Conception. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
